title: Documentation - AddOn Manager (ADD)
abstract:
# Documentation - AddOn Manager (ADD)
| Name and description        | Name and description.1        | Type      | Emit duration    | Labels                        |
|:----------------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------------|:---------------------------|:---------------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| add_addon_count          | add_addon_count          | add_addon_count   | add_addon_count   | add_addon_count                     |
| Number of AddOn custom resources (CR) in a cluster. | Number of AddOn custom resources (CR) in a cluster. | Gauge      | 1 m      | addon_cluster addonset addon gdch_version cluster_version chart_version addon_status addon_drifted |
| add_addonset_count         | add_addonset_count         | add_addonset_count   | add_addonset_count   | add_addonset_count                     |
| Number of AddOnSet CRs in a cluster.    | Number of AddOnSet CRs in a cluster.    | Gauge      | 1 m      | addon_cluster addonset gdch_version cluster_version            |
| add_addonsettemplate_count       | add_addonsettemplate_count       | add_addonsettemplate_count | add_addonsettemplate_count | add_addonsettemplate_count                   |
| Number of AddOnSetTemplate CRs in a cluster.  | Number of AddOnSetTemplate CRs in a cluster.  | Gauge      | 1 m      | gdch_version cluster_version                  |
| add_install_reconcile_time       | add_install_reconcile_time       | add_install_reconcile_time | add_install_reconcile_time | add_install_reconcile_time                   |
| Time to install AddOn.        | Time to install AddOn.        | Counter     | 1 m      | addon_cluster addonset addon gdch_version cluster_version addon_operation upgrade_from
